data.title: Adam Kirby - Creative Director at distillery
data.meta_description: Adam Kirby is a Creative Director with a strong background in art direction and design. Adam has worked at various agencies such as Mega Rad Ltd.
data.text: Adam Kirby is a Creative Director with a strong background in art direction and design. Adam has worked at various agencies such as Mega Rad Ltd., Intermarketing Agency, Forever Beta, and Table19, handling diverse clients and projects. With a Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design and a Master's degree in Design, Adam is known for their creative abilities and strategic thinking. Their career spans over several years, starting from their first job at The Marketing Store to their current role at distillery. Passionate about exploring the intersection of people and brands, Adam is always open to new opportunities in the creative field.
